title: Looking for Members ('pro' A5Trash)
body:
Hi, I'm looking for a Top, Mid and Sup player with silver+ rank.
Please also be open for other roles in case of switching.


Add Me: ScrubCloud
**EDIT** Roles are Filled, if you want to be a sub contact me as of above ^^
**EDIT** Everything has been filled and as of official as been closed, you can still add me and play normals with me so i can see how you perform and maybe I can think about your place in the team.

replies.body: Thanks for Applying, but the team's roles and subs have been filled.

I currently am in Bronze 4 (silver 5 in ranked teams). Top 5 champs (In order) {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:267}} But i can play most supports and will be willing to learn the ones you want.
Thanks for your time :)
-Traloop
